mapper.select: select s.KEY, s.SENIOR_NAME, s.SENIOR_ROADADDRESS, s.SENIOR_NUMADDRESS, s.SENIOR_CALL, s.SENIOR_LATITUDE, s.SENIOR_LONGITUDE, s.SIDO, s.SIGUNGU , l.SENIOR_LIKE_NUM from SENIOR s left join SENIOR_LIKE l on s.key = l.key where s.key < 25 order by key
select l.member_id, l.KEY, s.SENIOR_NAME, s.SENIOR_ROADADDRESS from senior_like l left join senior s on l.key=s.key where member_id='admin'
